participant_1.background:
My favorite thing to do on the weekends is to wear my band t-shirts and relax by watching foreign films.
i work at a bar.
My family is small, and we don't have a lot of money
My favorite websites are pet health sites, especially ones with information on poodles.
my mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.

participant_2.background:
I am a writer who uses my travels as inspiration for my work.
I am a healthy person, except for my love of milk.
I love to express myself through my costumes and love the energy of live music.
I fear the day I will have to leave my room and interact with other people.
I like to stay active and learn new things in my free time.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel and write about my experiences! I've been all over the world and I'm always looking for new places to explore.
That's so cool! I love to travel too, but I don't get to do it as much as I'd like.
Yeah, it's definitely expensive. But it's worth it!
What's your favorite place you've ever been?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorite places. But I think I'd have to say India. It's such a beautiful and vibrant country with so much to offer.
India is on my bucket list! It looks like an amazing place to visit.
You should definitely go! It's one of the most amazing places on earth.
What's the most interesting thing you've ever learned about India?

There are so many interesting things about India! But I think one of the most interesting things is that it's home to the largest number of languages in the world. There are over 200 different languages spoken in India!
Wow! That's crazy! I had no idea.
I'm definitely going to have to visit India someday.
I hope you do! It's an amazing place.
